rules_text:
[i]({T}: Add {G}.)[/i]
Kilvik Ruins enters tapped unless you control a Mountain and a Plains.
[i]Voyage[/i] – {1}{R}{G}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Kilvik Ruins: Create a 1/1 white Viking creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of differently named lands you control. Activate only as a sorcery.
